channel.title: Adding Player Commands

item.title: Adding Player Commands
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

//start of moderator/admin list, 0 = guest 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
playerRights = 3;/

do i need to edit any of that? is that even right? and

if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(554, 1337000); addItem(4278, 1337000); addItem(560, 1337000); }

do i need the player rights for that?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Player Commands
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,255232.0.html <-- i saw your post, but i misread it please follow these instructions.

Scroll down till you see the thing where it says something like making your player rights. okay,

put 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner
try putting 0 ( guests ) so that it would work for guest plus

i hope this helps… i can code for you if you’d like.

Msg me or something

&& playerRights >= 0) {

there you go, just add that next to the command with one space in it

That should work

[b] Good Luck, whats your ip for server?

item.title: Adding Player Commands
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

hey guys i’m using a hiyascape v1 source and i’m in need of help.

if (command.startsWith("runes")) { addItem(554, 1337000); addItem(4278, 1337000); addItem(560, 1337000); }

this command works for me and the co owner, but not regular players. what do i need to add in order to make everyone be able to do the command?

Read full topic
